name: Bazarr
check_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then if docker ps --filter 'name=bazarr' --filter 'status=running' --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -q '^bazarr$'; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker start bazarr 2>/dev/null || docker restart bazarr 2>/dev/null || true; fi
verify_cmd: if docker ps --filter 'name=bazarr' --filter 'status=running' --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -q '^bazarr$'; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
